mapper.select: select p.*,pt.ptypename,s.sname from product p,producttype pt,supplier s where pt.PTypeID=p.PTypeID and p.SupplierID=s.SupplierID and concat (PTypename,p.PName,s.SName) like #{user_name} order by p.productid asc
mapper.sql: ProductID, PName, PTypeID, SupplierID, PSpecification, PColor, PState, Punit, PImportPrice, PSellPrice, PStockNum, PCautionNum, PDeadDate, PSID, POthers
mapper.select: select p.*,pt.ptypename,s.sname from product p,producttype pt,supplier s where pt.PTypeID=p.PTypeID and p.SupplierID=s.SupplierID order by p.productid asc
mapper.insert: insert into product (ProductID, PName, PTypeID, SupplierID, PSpecification, PColor, PState, Punit, PImportPrice, PSellPrice, PStockNum, PCautionNum, PDeadDate, PSID, POthers ) values (#{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pspecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{punit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pimportprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{psellprice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{pstocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pcautionnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pdeaddate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into product
ProductID,
PName,
PTypeID,
SupplierID,
PSpecification,
PColor,
PState,
Punit,
PImportPrice,
PSellPrice,
PStockNum,
PCautionNum,
PDeadDate,
PSID,
POthers,

mapper.update:
update product
ProductID = #{record.productid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PName = #{record.pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PTypeID = #{record.ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SupplierID = #{record.supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PSpecification = #{record.pspecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PColor = #{record.pcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PState = #{record.pstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Punit = #{record.punit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PImportPrice = #{record.pimportprice,jdbcType=REAL},
PSellPrice = #{record.psellprice,jdbcType=REAL},
PStockNum = #{record.pstocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PCautionNum = #{record.pcautionnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PDeadDate = #{record.pdeaddate,jdbcType=DATE},
PSID = #{record.psid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POthers = #{record.pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update product set ProductID = #{record.productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PName = #{record.pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PTypeID = #{record.ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SupplierID = #{record.supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PSpecification = #{record.pspecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PColor = #{record.pcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PState = #{record.pstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Punit = #{record.punit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PImportPrice = #{record.pimportprice,jdbcType=REAL}, PSellPrice = #{record.psellprice,jdbcType=REAL}, PStockNum = #{record.pstocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PCautionNum = #{record.pcautionnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PDeadDate = #{record.pdeaddate,jdbcType=DATE}, PSID = #{record.psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POthers = #{record.pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update product
PName = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PTypeID = #{ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PSpecification = #{pspecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PColor = #{pcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PState = #{pstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Punit = #{punit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PImportPrice = #{pimportprice,jdbcType=REAL},
PSellPrice = #{psellprice,jdbcType=REAL},
PStockNum = #{pstocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PCautionNum = #{pcautionnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PDeadDate = #{pdeaddate,jdbcType=DATE},
PSID = #{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POthers = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update product set PName = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PTypeID = #{ptypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SupplierID = #{supplierid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PSpecification = #{pspecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PColor = #{pcolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PState = #{pstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Punit = #{punit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PImportPrice = #{pimportprice,jdbcType=REAL}, PSellPrice = #{psellprice,jdbcType=REAL}, PStockNum = #{pstocknum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PCautionNum = #{pcautionnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PDeadDate = #{pdeaddate,jdbcType=DATE}, PSID = #{psid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POthers = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ProductID = #{productid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
